attributes.action: ensure a decent UK entry for Eurovision this year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please, let us put an end to the suffering of eurovision fans with a decent entry this year. 

No more out of date rapping, double denim, people who cant sing in tune, 90's has beens etc...

Yet another 'european venture' that we put a disproportionate amount of money into yet suffer weak reward.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
